## OpenAPI.AnimationUtils.setImageAnimation() method

设置图像动画

**Signature:**

```typescript
static setImageAnimation(taskName: string | null, object: UIStandAvatar, aniID: number, complete?: Callback): void;
```

## Example


```ts
OpenAPI.AnimationUtils.setImageAnimation('taskName', object, 1, Callback.New(() => {
  console.log('动画播放完成')
}, this))
```
